name: Robotrace
description:
This game was a concept invented and executed as part of a gamejam in May of 2017. It involved approx. 10 teams, each comprised of 3-5 members, creating a game from scratch during a weekend.

Our game pits 2 players against each other in a deathmatch of sorts where the way to defeat your opponent is to kill your own robot before they can do the same to themselves. To accomplish this, the game spawns random traps in the levels that must be triggered using the appropriate switch. One other way to win is to get jumped on 2 times in quick succession by the other player. The first player to get to 5 suicides wins.

Due to the time constraints, we didn't really get a chance to exploit our map generator and the game mechanics are in a pretty buggy state, though we feel that with a little polish, the core idea has some potential.

Created with Unity, download contains a ready-made executable build. Requires 64-bit system, built for Windows.

Controls:

Player 1
Move left:          A
Move right:       D
Jump:                   W
Drop:                    S
Activate trap:   Left Ctrl

Player 2

Move left:          J
Move right:       L
Jump:                    I
Drop:                    K
Activate trap:   Right Ctrl

Programmers: Andres Salminen, Riku Sykäri, Teemu Saarinen
Artist: Päivi Lindell

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com/
